games.title: Resident Evil
games.description: The game's plot begins with the arrival of Chris, Jill, and Wesker at a mansion located in the woods. There, they will encounter the undead dwelling in the corridors and rooms. In that place, they will try to escape without being eaten by the dogs that are outside. Soon, they witness the experiments carried out by the most important company in the city and a series of betrayals that extend to the S.T.A.R.S.

characters.name: Chris Redfield
characters.description: Upon joining S.T.A.R.S., he was assigned the position of Alpha Team's scout, tasked with opening up and reconnoitering the ground. As such, exceptional shooting and combat skills were expected of him, as well as a great ability to use various weapons.

characters.name: Jill Valentine
characters.description: Upon joining S.T.A.R.S., she was assigned the position of Alpha Team's Back-Up. Notably, Jill was already a specialist in locks and explosives.

characters.name: Albert Wesker
characters.description: Upon joining S.T.A.R.S., he was assigned as Captain of Alpha Team and the entire unit.

characters.name: Rebecca Chambers
characters.description: Rebecca Chambers possesses a brilliant intellect and extensive knowledge in medicine, specifically biochemistry. Thanks to her valuable expertise, she earned acceptance into the special unit of the R.P.D., known as S.T.A.R.S. She was integrated into the team, serving as a doctor within the Bravo Team.

characters.name: Barry Burton
characters.description: Upon joining S.T.A.R.S., he was assigned as a member of Team Alpha under Wesker's orders. He is a highly skilled weapons specialist.

characters.name: Zombie
characters.description: A human being infected with the T-virus becomes a type of undead, a result of the virus's transformative effects on the host.

characters.name: MA-39 Cerberus
characters.description: Doberman dogs infected with the T-Virus have escaped from the research labs located beneath the mansion.

characters.name: Tyrant T-002
characters.description: The Tyrant T-002 was the first Tyrant created based on the T-Virus within a living human being. It surpassed its predecessor, the Proto Tyrant, in every aspect, making it a superior B.O.W. (Big Organic Weapon). This creation took place in the laboratory of the Spencer mansion, situated in the Arklay Mountains.

games.epilogue: In the lab, Wesker unveils his true identity as a double agent working for Umbrella. He has used his minions as guinea pigs to test them against the biological weapons created by the T-Virus. Eventually, Wesker unleashes the Tyrant T-002, a colossal humanoid monster created through prolonged exposure to the T-Virus. Tragically, the Tyrant kills Wesker by impaling him with its claws. Chris/Jill engage in a fierce battle with the Tyrant, utilizing their firearms to seemingly kill the monstrous creature. They then activate the self-destruct program to put an end to the lab experiments. As they contact the rescue helicopter, the Tyrant resurfaces through the lab's roof onto the helicopter's landing pad, launching a sudden attack. Despite its resistance to bullets, the Tyrant meets its demise when Brad, the helicopter pilot, drops a rocket launcher. Chris/Jill seize the opportunity and use the rocket launcher to obliterate the creature. With the Tyrant defeated, Chris Redfield and Jill Valentine escape in the helicopter just moments before the mansion explodes, bringing the game to its climactic conclusion.

games.title: Resident Evil 2
games.description: The story takes place in Raccoon City, an American city whose population has mostly been transformed into zombies by the T-virus, a biological weapon developed by the Umbrella company. While fleeing the city, Officer Leon S. Kennedy and college student Claire Redfield meet and bond with other survivors, only to discover that Umbrella is trying to seize a sample of the new virus to continue their biological experiments on humans.

characters.name: Leon Scott Kennedy
characters.description: Leon, at the young age of 21, was assigned to work for the Raccoon City Police Department (Raccoon Police Department abbreviated R.P.D.) in its division, the Select Police Forces (S.P.F.). After graduating from the police academy, he arrived in Raccoon City on September 29, 1998 as his first day on the job, but was met with a terrifying experience that would change his life forever.

characters.name: Claire Redfield
characters.description: Claire begins to worry about her brother, Chris Redfield, after losing contact with him, then she goes to Raccoon City to look for him, but far from finding him it is Umbrella who crosses her path.

characters.name: Ada Wong
characters.description: Ada is a corporate spy working for an unidentified competitor of the Umbrella Corporation, who intends to acquire from Umbrella all kinds of bio-organic weapons and a sample of the G-Virus developed by William Birkin.

characters.name: Sherry Birkin
characters.description: She is the daughter of Annette Birkin and William Birkin, the scientists who gave rise to the G-virus.

characters.name: William Birkin
characters.description: He is a scientist working for the Umbrella Corporation and developer of the powerful G-Virus. After a series of disagreements with the Umbrella Corporation, the latter sends a team to execute William and thus obtain the virus samples. before his death, Birkin injected himself with a sample of the G-Virus and survived, though he ended up mutating into a hideous monster known as G.

characters.name: Tyrant T-103
characters.description: Tyrant-class bioweapon model, sent by the Umbrella Corporation to retrieve a sample of the Birkin-created virus. Said sample is found in Sherry's necklace.

characters.name: Annette Birkin
characters.description: She is a scientist who works with her husband Dr. William Birkin for the Umbrella Corporation. mother of Sherry Birkin, and one of the creators of the G-Virus

games.epilogue: the group of protagonists that manages to flee aboard a train, is pursued by Birkin who has assumed a grotesque appearance due to mutations in his body, causing the machine's self-destruct system to activate, forcing the protagonists to stop him in middle of the tunnel. Once they manage to stop the train, the trio manage to escape leaving Birkin trapped, who eventually dies after the train explodes. Leon reveals his intention to take down Umbrella as he leaves Raccoon City with Sherry, and Claire continues her search for her brother. In the end, it is revealed that Ada survived the deadly encounter with the creature by managing to get hold of a sample of the G-Virus.

games.title: Resident Evil 3
games.description: The story is divided into two halves; the first takes place during the first hours of the outbreak of the T virus in Raccoon City, taking place 24 hours before the events that occurred in Resident Evil 2 and the last takes place two days after said events. The protagonist Jill Valentine, who survived the viral disaster of the Spencer mansion from the first installment, must escape the city before the United States government decides to eradicate it along with its infected population by means of a nuclear missile, but what What he doesn't know is that the Umbrella Corporation has created a specially programmed biological weapon to eliminate all remaining members of S.T.A.R.S, Nemesis.

characters.name: Jill Valentine
characters.description: She had been removed from police forces after the Spencer Mansion Incident. During the Raccoon City incident, she was in her apartment when she is suddenly attacked by an intelligent bioweapon known as the Nemesis, which tries to kill her and all the remaining members of S.T.A.R.S. She will have to escape from the city and from nemesis.

characters.name: Carlos Oliveira
characters.description: He is a former member of the Umbrella Biohazard Countermeasure Service (U.B.C.S.). Umbrella gave orders to the UBCS squad to obtain the virus sample, but almost the entire squad is wiped out by the t-virus disaster, so Carlos decides to search for survivors in the city.

characters.name: Nemesis
characters.description: It is one of the Umbrella Corporation's deadliest biological weapons. It is the next step in the investigations of the pharmaceutical company Umbrella, the evolution of T-103 (Tyrant with a human appearance in principle, which appears in Resident Evil 2). Nemesis's mission is very simple: exterminate the members of S.T.A.R.S. that remain in Raccoon City, so Jill Valentine must prepare for her worst nightmare

characters.name: Nicholai Ginovaef
characters.description: He is one of the members of Umbrella's private army, the U.B.C.S., as well as the leader of Section B of Delta Squad. In the Raccoon City incident, he was serving as a squad leader, with the rank of Sergeant, sent by Umbrella to contain the virus outbreak and save civilians. but his true nature was as a member of the company's secret internal spy organization known as the `Overseers`, with a secret mission to collect combat data on those infected with the virus and the B.O.W.s. of Umbrella, along with other dangers in the infested city.

characters.name: Mikhail Victor
characters.description: He is a member of Umbrella's private army, the U.B.C.S., as well as being the leader of Delta Squad.

games.epilogue: Jill manages to synthesize a vaccine, but an encounter with the Nemesis causes Nikolai to steal it when he leaves her to fight the monster. After receiving a special acid bath, Nemesis's body takes heavy damage causing her to mutate further, and after much difficulty, Jill manages to kill Nemesis using an experimental Railgun, killing her pursuer for good. Jill is disarmed by Nikolai and watches as he destroys the vaccine while revealing that she has no interest in Raccoon City's survival as long as she is well paid for keeping Umbrella's involvement in the city's destruction a secret. she demands that he tell her who hired him to which Nikolai by way of making fun of her, she tells him that she will tell him in exchange for a good salary. Jill snatches the vaccine container from him and leaves Nikolai to die when finally the government-launched ballistic missile hits Raccoon City, destroying the city and wiping out all existence of the T-Virus while Jill and Carlos managed to escape. by helicopter to which Jill swears that she will make Umbrella pay for this mess.

games.title: Resident Evil 4
games.description: 2004, northern hemisphere autumn, six years have passed since Raccoon City was destroyed under the orders of the United States Government in order to avoid a Pandemic scenario due to the viral disaster that destroyed the city and its serious threat to the rest of the world. Leon S. Kennedy is recruited by the United States Secret Service upon learning of his survival in the Raccoon City incident and also because of his talented weapons handling and paramilitary skills. He is the one chosen to be sent on a special mission to rescue Ashley Graham, the president's daughter, who has been kidnapped by a strange organization. She finds herself in a rural town in Spain, the protagonist travels there where he runs into a group of violent villagers who swear allegiance to Los Illuminados, the organization that kidnapped Ashley.

characters.name: Leon Scott Kennedy
characters.description: He went from being a rookie cop to becoming a secret service agent under the direct orders of the president.For 6 years, Leon went through a series of tough training and ruthless missions, making him a highly regarded agent.He was entrusted with the mission of rescuing the president's daughter who was kidnapped and is located in a small town in Europe. Not even Leon will be prepared for what is coming...

characters.name: Ashley Graham
characters.description: She is the daughter of the President of the United States. When Ashley was on her way home from school, she was kidnapped by Jack Krauser. Leon must save her, protect her and escape from her together.

characters.name: Ada Wong
characters.description: Ada had been left for dead after the events in Raccoon City six years ago, but the truth about her fate turned out to be something different. Against all odds she survived and was helped by Albert Wesker. In exchange for this help she agreed to continue working for her organization and quickly became her best agent. Therefore, she must enter Osmund Saddler's domain and snatch the samples of the Las Plagas parasite from him.

characters.name: Luis Sera
characters.description: He was an ex-policeman who worked in Madrid and later a great scientist who helped Saddler with his experiments. Ada Wong helped him remove the plague from Luis's body, and as a reward for her, he would help her get the sample of the plagues, but she is captured by Saddler's men. Luis also developed a machine that destroyed the Las Plagas parasite. Throughout the story, Luis will help Leon and Ada.

characters.name: Jack Krauser
characters.description: Former colleague of Leon Scott Kennedy. He was presumed dead in 2002 and hired by Albert Wesker. his task was to enter the sect to extract one more sample of the supposed Plague developed by Luis Sera. he had to infiltrate them and prove that he was infinitely loyal to Saddler, he ordered him to kidnap the President's daughter, Ashley Graham to gain access to the cult, and Krauser himself took care of directing the operation while the girl returned home.

characters.name: Osmund Saddler
characters.description: `main prophet` and maximum leader of Los Illuminados, a sect and paramilitary organization that sought world domination and the establishment of a new world order through the parasites known as Las Plagas, using the kidnapping of Ashley Graham, daughter of the President of The USA.

characters.name: Ramón Salazar
characters.description: Eighth Castilian prince, owner of the castle of Salazar. Saddler's Right Hand

characters.name: Bitores Méndez
characters.description: mayor of the town, and was very loved by all the residents, until the arrival of Osmund Saddler to the town. Saddler took over Mendez's mind so that the town would follow him. Saddler observed that the loyalty that the people of El Pueblo had to him was too valuable, so in addition to the normal Plague in his body, he inoculated him with the Control Plague, which allowed him to manipulate the Ganados as well, but would be forced to remain faithful to him.

games.epilogue: After fighting Krauser and It, Leon is finally able to successfully rescue Ashley and flee from Saddler with Ada's help. However, Saddler captures Ada and challenges Leon to one last fight. After an intense fight with Saddler who mutates his body into a monstrous appearance, Leon kills him with a special rocket launcher provided by Ada. After retrieving the sample, Ada forces him to give it to him, and gives him the keys to a jet ski so they can escape the island, while she escapes from the complex in a helicopter. Although Leon and Ashley manage to escape the island, the sample's whereabouts and fate remain uncertain.

games.title: Resident Evil 5
games.description: Five years after the events of Resident Evil 4, in 2009, Chris Redfield as a member of the B.S.A.A., is sent to a remote African town, precisely to Kijuju, following in the footsteps of a bioterrorist named Ricardo Irving, who is wanted by the B.S.A.A for selling biological weapons to terrorists. In the mission he is assigned as a partner a young agent from the African division of the B.S.A.A. called Sheva Alomar, along with several agents scattered throughout Kijuju (known as the Alpha Group)

characters.name: Chris Redfield
characters.description: In 2006, the B.S.A.A. receives information on the whereabouts of Umbrella founder Oswell E. Spencer. Jill Valentine and Chris Redfield are ordained by the European Headquarters of the B.S.A.A. to stop him, and they accept the mission, hoping to discover some information that can lead them to the whereabouts of Albert Wesker, but after an encounter with wesker, jill sacrifices herself to save chris. six years after the destruction of the Umbrella Pharmaceutical Corporation, and 11 years after the Raccoon City Destruction Incident. Chris Redfield is dispatched by the B.S.A.A. to investigate a possible smuggling of bio-organic weapons in Africa along with his partner sheeva alomar.

characters.name: Albert Wesker
characters.description: In 2009, he continued his activities by returning to work with Tricell and forming an alliance with Excella Gionne, who shared his vision of a new world. Wesker was already ready to carry out the strategy of perfecting Spencer's plan, so he continued to help Excella gain even greater positions of power within Tricell and soon she became the Director of Tricell's Africa Facility. With this alliance, the old Umbrella Research Center in Africa was reopened under Wesker's control along with the source of the Progenitor virus, Sun Ascension. Wesker used part of each viral agent to create the most powerful virus, the Uroboros virus. . With Uroboros, he planned to drive the next step in human evolution.

characters.name: Sheva alomar
characters.description: Shortly after arriving in the United States, Sheva began to stand out for her intelligence and drive. She exceeded all expectations and even mastered English in just six months. After starting the B.S.A.A. an investigation into a possible biohazard in the Kijuju Autonomous Zone, Sheva was chosen to be a partner of Chris Redfield

characters.name: Jill Valentine
characters.description: In 2006, Chris and Jill received a tip from a reliable source detailing the location of Umbrella founder Oswell E. Spencer. Although the two put up a fierce battle, Chris and Jill saw each other and were overwhelmed by Wesker's superhuman powers, and so, as Wesker was about to deliver the blow that would end Chris's life, Jill lunged at Wesker. Throwing them both out of a window into the abyss beyond the mansion's cliff, Chris couldn't do anything as he watched Jill and Wesker fall through that window. Neither Jill nor Wesker died on that occasion after falling into the abyss. Jill survived thanks to the help of Wesker who, after subjecting her to the corresponding medical treatment, cryogenically placed her. Her plan was to use her as her first guinea pig after the Uroboros project was finished.

characters.name: Josh Stone
characters.description: Josh Stone is a member of the West African chapter of the BSAA, though upon inspection, his BSAA patch says North America. He was the leader of the BSAA Delta Team for the Kijuju mission. Josh was the captain of the first team Sheva Alomar joined when he joined the B.S.A.A. and trained her for eight months. After the training, Sheva and Stone developed a very close relationship in which he refers to Sheva as 'The Little Sister of the Team'.

characters.name: Excella Gionne
characters.description: Her grandmother, Virginia Gionne, was related to the Travis family, founders of the Tricell pharmaceutical company, giving Excella an illustrious and noble lineage. Over time she became CEO of the African division of Tricell, and a partner of Albert Wesker, sharing with him the same vision for the future of the world.

games.epilogue: Chris and Sheva are in the bomber hangar. Wesker had supplied the plane with enough Uroboros-carrying missiles to infect the entire planet. In the ensuing fight, Chris manages to inject Wesker with an extra dose of the serums Excella dropped. This greatly weakens Wesker, forcing him to run away, and the Jet escapes him, though Chris and Sheva are able to catch up. Wesker reveals that the bomber is now climbing to the ideal altitude for global saturation, and that he plans to unleash the virus shortly. Chris and Sheva continue to fight Wesker, with the former injecting him with another dose of the serum. Chris then pulls him out of an airlock, but manages to grab Sheva, after which the jetty falls into a volcano. Wesker, who is still alive, plunges his right arm into an intact Uroboros missile, and the virus immediately engulfs him. Josh, piloting a B.S.A.A. helicopter, spots the couple, and Jill Valentine lowers them down a ladder. Chris and Sheva barely escape when the ground melts under them. Jill tells Chris and Sheva to use the rear-mounted RPG-7s. The two partners send a pair of anti-tank rockets into Albert Wesker's corrupted face, ending his life in a cloud of flame and ash.

games.title: Resident Evil 6
games.description: The game begins in a flashback of Leon Scott Kennedy where he pays a visit to the president in 2013. Fifteen years have passed since the events in Raccoon City and the president of the United States, a personal friend of Leon's, is determined to tell the whole story. truth about those facts. However, a bioterrorist attack prevents the appearance and transforms the president into a deformed being, forcing Leon to make a difficult decision, along with a mysterious new partner named Helena Harper. /n At the same time, Chris Redfield and Piers Nivans, both part of the B.S.A.A., are in China, a country where a bioterrorist threat has been unleashed.there is also a third story that stars Jake Muller and Sherry Birkin. (This first, being the son of Albert Wesker). Sherry protects Jake in order to save his blood, which is apparently the only antidote to the C-Virus. It has also been confirmed that the place where these two characters are located is Eastern Europe.

characters.name: Leon Scott Kennedy
characters.description: 15 years after the Raccoon City incident, in 2013, Leon is forced to make the most difficult decision of his life and that is to assassinate the President of the United States. Leon with his new partner Helena Harper, are trapped in a region of the United States known as `Tall Oaks`, according to Ingrid Hunnigan, 90% of the population has been infected with the virus and that equates to more than 70,000 enemies. Leon, wanting answers about the situation, is forced by Helena's request to go to Tall Oaks Cathedral to find answers.

characters.name: Chris Redfield
characters.description: After the events of March 5, 6 and 7, 2009, Chris took Jill back to the US, he soon received an email from Barry Burton, who told him that he was too happy to know that she had returned. and that he had also brought Jill with him. Chris went from being an S.O.A. to be a Captain S.O.U. In the B.S.A.A., with his new position he met his new soldiers, including Piers Nivans. On December 24, 2012, the S.O.U. of the North American Branch of the B.S.A.A. Sent to Edonia to quell a civil war, Alpha Team consisting of Chris Redfield, Piers Nivans, Ben Airhart, Carl Alfonso, Finn Macauley, and Andy Walker were stationed in Eastern Edonia, where a new B.O.W.s known as J'avos had started. a civil war.

characters.name: Ada Wong
characters.description: Ada Wong will be located in the middle of all the chaos, since everyone thinks that she is the one who caused the bioterrorist attack, when the real cause of everything is Carla Radames (a clone) which was created by Derek C. Simmons inside a Chrysalis with the C-virus. Carla is the only person behind Neo-Umbrella.

characters.name: Jake Muller
characters.description: He is the son of virologist and bioterrorist Albert Wesker and an unknown mother. Without Albert, Jake soon finds work as a mercenary in order to support his mother, who later dies of illness. Cooperating in operations against the government of the Republic of Edonia, Jake became involved in an act of bioterrorism. Jake's fellow mercenaries were infected with the C-Virus, however, Jake's antibodies (inherited directly from his father), managed to neutralize the virus. Soon after, he met with US government agent Sherry Birkin.

characters.name: Sherry Birkin
characters.description: 15 years after the incident in Raccoon City, trained as a United States special agent. She joined B.S.A.A. for trying to be just like her her heroes Leon S. Kennedy and Claire Redfield whom she admires. she was sent to edonia to search for jake muller, who possesses the antibodies for the virus-c

characters.name: Helena Harper
characters.description: Helena Harper is an agent of the DSO (Division of Security Operations), a secret security organization that works under the orders of the US government. Attempted to be transferred to the US Secret Service to become one of US President Adam Benford's personal bodyguards, and became implicated in the bioterrorism attack on the town of Tall Oaks that led to the death of the president. Together with Leon, they will have to investigate who caused the attack.

characters.name: Piers Nivans
characters.description: In 2010, Chris Redfield, impressed by Piers' skills, asked him to join the B.S.A.A. Piers was very impressed with the way Chris led his team: he treated his teammates like family, not expendable soldiers. Chris, for his part, was aware that he couldn't work as a field agent forever, and so he recruited Piers. Chris believed that the future of the B.S.A.A. it was in the hands of talented individuals like Piers, and he, in turn, had a good cause to fight for. he would later be part of the alpha team in edonia

games.epilogue: After several encounters with Simmons along the way, the agents arrive at the helipad facing Simmons' latest mutation, resembling a giant fly. After a long battle, Simmons is finally killed by being impaled on a metal stake. Leon and Helena, relieved, since the person responsible for the events is dead, they get on the helicopter after seeing that Ada left them a chip with the evidence that betrays Simmons and proves Leon and Helena's innocence of what happened to the president. Leon asks Chris to rescue Jake and Sherry who were captured by Neo-Umbrella before revealing to Jake and also confirming that he is the son of bioterrorist Albert Wesker. Chris and Piers are taken with a B.O.W. known as Haos and face each other. Piers loses one of his arms and is forced to inject himself with the C-Virus and save Chris. While both escaped, Piers decides to stay, knowing that it was only a matter of time before the virus completely transformed him, so he gives his emblem to Chris and activates the escape pod so that he can escape while making one last attempt. the B.O.W. He tries to finish off Chris, but luckily the explosion from the base reaches the creature, eliminating it while on the surface, Chris saw how a helicopter was preparing to evacuate him. On the other hand, Jake and Sherry manage to escape from the neo-umbrella facilities. finally jake tells sherry that she only charged 50 dollars for her blood sample for the cure of the virus.

games.title: Resident Evil 7
games.description: Four years after the incidents in China, a man named Ethan Winters receives a strange message from his wife, Mia, whom he believed to be dead after missing for 3 years, where she is located for the last time in an abandoned plantation, in the surrounding area. from the city of Dulvey in Louisiana. Ethan manages to reach that location and starts looking for it. he finds mine but she is somewhat distracted and nervous. after a few moments, she attacks him. Ethan had no choice but to kill her in her own defense. Trying to escape from her, Mia returns but this time with a chainsaw, which cuts off Ethan's hand. He `finishes` her again, and a few moments after her a man appears who takes Ethan and knocks him unconscious. This man's words were `welcome to the family`...

characters.name: Ethan Winters
characters.description: He was born in 1984 and as an adult he met a woman named Mia, over time they became boyfriends and in 2011 they got married. During her relationship, Ethan would ask about Mia's job, unaware that she worked for Las Conexiones, a company that manufactures and produces biological weapons. In 2014, his wife informed him that she was going to babysit on a ship. During her trip on the metal ship Annabelle, but after October 10, it was reported that the ship Mia was traveling on disappeared due to a storm and she was presumed dead. Three years after Mia's disappearance, Ethan received an email from her saying that he was in Dulvey, Louisiana, and was at a farm for him to come look for her. he doesn't know what she awaits him...

characters.name: Mia Winters
characters.description: In 2010 she started working for the company Las Conexiones, which is dedicated to the manufacture and production of biological weapons internationally on the black market, Mia became a researcher and one of the company's special operatives.

characters.name: Eveline
characters.description: she is a genetically modified human conceived as part of the next generation of biological weapons research, led by an unidentified B.O.W. maker, designed to take out enemies without the need for combat. As a result of the fusion of an abnormal bacterium into her genome during the embryonic stage, she gained the ability to control the minds of people who came in contact with her. she was the only one to be Type-E's first bioweapon, as well as her unhealthy obsession with creating a family that meets her own needs.

characters.name: Chris Redfield
characters.description: In 2017, the B.S.A.A. He had information from an underground crime syndicate called Las Conexiones, which has been involved in biochemical weapons research, drug and weapons trafficking, as well as money laundering. The B.S.A.A. had to cooperate with Blue Umbrella, an organization formed from Umbrella USA by the US Government to help counter combat with the B.O.W. by developing new weapons and Anti-B.O.W. Blue Umbrella asked the BSAA to send Chris Redfield to receive assistance for upcoming missions. The objective of the mission was to apprehend Lucas Baker, an alleged associate of the criminal organization Las Conexiones, who was in possession of the biological weapon known as Eveline.

games.epilogue: Ethan synthesizes a powerful toxin to kill the girl by injecting it into her, then proceeds through a series of tunnels that eventually lead him to the Baker house, visited right at the start of the game. Eveline causes Ethan many hallucinations of attacks, as well as psychic shocks, but Ethan overcomes them and injects Eveline with the toxin, ending her hallucinations, and revealing that Eveline was always the old woman in a wheelchair, who has been aging rapidly ever since. his escape. The toxin recedes, turning Eveline into a large monster. Aided by the arrival of a military squad, Ethan is able to defeat Eveline. With the threat removed, the squad and their leader, who identifies himself as Redfield, extract Ethan in a helicopter. At this point in the end if Ethan doesn't heal Mia, he throws his phone, which contains his last message, from the helicopter, saying 'goodbye'. If Mia was cured, she is found alive receiving medical attention aboard Redfield's helicopter. As the helicopter flies away, it is shown to bear the trademark of the Umbrella Corporation, but with a blue color.

games.title: Resident Evil 8
games.description: The story takes place in an isolated mountainous region around a medieval village and castle in Eastern Europe. Ethan and Mia Winters were still together and trying to move on with their lives three years after the Dulvey incident. During the course of the story, the Winters' daughter, Rosemary, is kidnapped by some individuals, which forces Ethan to travel to the town, a place where strange events occur in the region with the appearance of strange creatures and control of the castle by the Dimitrescu family who have strange abilities, also seeing faces with an old friend from the Dulvey incident, Chris Redfield.

characters.name: Ethan Winters
characters.description: 3 years and 8 months after the events of the Dulvey incident, Ethan and Mia have settled into a peaceful life and have moved to Europe courtesy of Chris and together they have conceived a daughter named Rosemary, Ethan also participates in military training in a better preparation to defend his family in case they were to encounter threats again...

characters.name: Mia Winters
characters.description: On February 2, 2021, they celebrated Rose's half-birthday and on the 6th, when Ethan accidentally mentions the Dulvey incident, they had a fight partly due to how many years she had been in the secret. Shortly after this, Mia was kidnapped and subjected to multiple experiments by her former colleague her Miranda, who wished to use Rose as a vessel for her deceased daughter hers Eva. Miranda locked Mia in her lab and impersonated her, taking her place in an attempt to kidnap Rose from Ethan.

characters.name: Rosemary Winters
characters.description: daughter of Ethan and Mia Winters. She was kidnapped when she was a baby by a mysterious cult led by Mother Miranda, who will try to use Rose as a vessel to resurrect her daughter Eva.

characters.name: Chris Redfield
characters.description: After what happened in Dulvey, Chris after seeing that the BSAA decided to cover up what happened with the Bakers saying that they died after a gas leak exploding the house, without telling the truth about Eveline and The Connections, Chris decided to found the Hound Wolf squad This being an elite unit of the BSAA during 2018, working separately, beginning to distrust the organization with which I previously worked and trusted, separating from it.

characters.name: Miranda
characters.description: With the megamycete, Miranda infected the villagers to search for a host that could house her daughter's consciousness. She also designed a parasite known as a Cadou, which granted powers to the four family hierarchs of the valley. The organization known as Las Conexiones contacts her to help her in her investigations. Miranda supplies them with samples of the megamycete and the DNA of her daughter. It was in this way that the chemical weapon known as Eveline was created. She was a tutor to one of the founders of Umbrella, Oswell E. Spencer, who was inspired by Miranda's studies on infecting living organisms.

characters.name: Alcina Dimitrescu
characters.description: She is the owner of the Dimitrescu Castle and an important member of a mysterious cult led by Mother Miranda.

characters.name: Karl Heisenberg
characters.description: He will be in charge of pursuing and capturing Ethan Winters on the orders of a mysterious cult led by Mother Miranda. He has electrical organs connected to his nervous system. Thanks to this he can control electricity through his body, which gives him the ability to create electromagnetic fields and direct metal.

characters.name: Donna Beneviento
characters.description: She is the leader of the Beneviento Family as well as an important member of a cult led by Mother Miranda. she carries with her a puppet named Angie who she can control and is always found in the Beneviento House on the outskirts of the Village.

games.epilogue: Ethan synthesizes a powerful toxin to kill the girl by injecting it into her, then proceeds through a series of tunnels that eventually lead him to the Baker house, visited right at the start of the game. Eveline causes Ethan many hallucinations of attacks, as well as psychic shocks, but Ethan overcomes them and injects Eveline with the toxin, ending her hallucinations, and revealing that Eveline was always the old woman in a wheelchair, who has been aging rapidly ever since. his escape. The toxin recedes, turning Eveline into a large monster. Aided by the arrival of a military squad, Ethan is able to defeat Eveline. With the threat removed, the squad and their leader, who identifies himself as Redfield, extract Ethan in a helicopter. At this point in the end if Ethan doesn't heal Mia, he throws his phone, which contains his last message, from the helicopter, saying 'goodbye'. If Mia was cured, she is found alive receiving medical attention aboard Redfield's helicopter. As the helicopter flies away, it is shown to bear the trademark of the Umbrella Corporation, but with a blue color.
